titleInfo.title: Managing the crowd : rethinking records management for the Web 2.0 world

mods.abstract: The big picture: Web 2.0 and current trends in IT -- The reality check: surely change is endemic in IT? -- Web 2.0 and Office 2.0: enter the third paradigm -- Welcome to the world of Office 2.0 -- The need for critical professional self-examination -- 'Not all information sources are records ...' -- The centralized command and control ethos -- 'Regardless of format ...' -- Appraisal, retention and destruction -- The problem with applying existing approaches to appraisal in the Web 2.0 world -- The 10 defining principles of Records Management 2.0 -- Expanding on the principles.
